name: Facebook - Blue-Gray Background
description:
Changes the background color to Blue-Gray, the links to mediumblue and the text to black.

Applies also to the Facebook Comments plugin.

It goes well with my style 33602.

See also my :
style 75311.
and style 63176

user.name: LL25255252
user.about: I sometimes forget to check my userstyles RSS so if you want to report a problem send me a private message instead of starting a new discussion/review/question.

additional_info:
